item.title: 英国承受全球债券大跌的冲击
item.description: 在同等条件下，利率上升通常会导致货币走强。然而，本周金边债券收益率的飙升却伴随着英镑的下滑，这可能表明投资者对持续的通胀压力和财政可持续性感到担忧，从而导致资本外逃。【原文：Higher interest rates, all things equal, typically lead to a strengthening currency. Yet the surge in gilt yields this week has been accompanied by a slide in the pound, possibly indicating capital flight as investors fret about persistent inflationary pressures and fiscal sustainability.】

item.title: 波兰开始出售 2025 年外汇债务以满足创纪录的资金需求
item.description: 波兰正在启动今年的首次外币债券销售，以满足创纪录的融资需求，并在美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普就职前加入新兴市场债务发行的热潮。【原文：Poland is launching its first foreign-currency bond sales of the year, seeking to cover record financing needs and joining a rush of emerging-market debt issuance before US President-elect Donald Trump takes office.】

item.title: 美联储发现新的理由，让人对隐晦的通胀指标充满信心
item.description: 包括主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）在内的美联储高官们越来越多地将一个不起眼的物价指标作为维持对前景信心的理由："基于市场的 "通货膨胀。【原文：Top Federal Reserve officials — including Chair Jerome Powell — are increasingly pointing to an obscure price gauge as a reason to maintain confidence in their outlook: “market-based” inflation.】

item.title: 受美联储加息谨慎和新人工智能芯片限制影响，新兴市场资产下跌
item.description: 受美元走强和美国计划延长限制人工智能芯片出口的影响，新兴市场股市周四连续第二天下跌。【原文：Emerging-market stocks fell for a second day Thursday, pressured by dollar strength and US plans to extend curbs on artifical-intelligence chip exports.】

item.title: TCS 盈利未达预期，表明 IT 支出仍未回升
item.description: 印度塔塔咨询服务有限公司（Tata Consultancy Services Ltd.）公布的财报未能达到分析师的预期，这表明海外客户在信息技术项目上的押注依然谨慎。【原文：India’s Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. reported earnings that missed analysts’ estimates, signaling overseas clients are still cautious in betting big on information technology projects.】

item.title: 匈牙利财政部称 2024 年预算目标可能再次落空
item.description: 据匈牙利经济部估计，在国家重新陷入衰退后，匈牙利去年的预算赤字可能超过了目标。【原文：Hungary probably overshot its budget deficit goal last year after the nation re-entered a recession, according to Economy Ministry estimates.】

item.title: 法国社会党首领称预算妥协谈判取得进展
item.description: 据社会党党魁奥利维耶-福尔（Olivier Faure）称，左翼政党集团与法国政府就预算问题的谈判正在取得进展，这为法国总理弗朗索瓦-巴伊鲁（Francois Bayrou）在下周提出其政策重点之前达成一致提供了可能的途径。【原文：Talks between a group of left-wing parties and the French government on the budget are advancing, according to Socialist head Olivier Faure, providing a potential avenue for agreement ahead of Prime Minister Francois Bayrou’s presentation of his policy priorities next week.】

item.title: 比特币走势乏力，美国 ETF 日流出量创第二新高
item.description: 比特币在新年伊始表现强劲，重新突破了 100,000 美元的关口，但这一原始数字资产正努力保持发展势头。【原文：After a strong start to the new year that saw Bitcoin retake the $100,000 level, the original digital asset is struggling to maintain momentum.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯赞成在 2025 年保持更多耐心，减少降息次数
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）表示，在强劲的就业数据和持续的通货膨胀之后，她倾向于 2025 年的降息次数少于几个月前的预期。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said she favors fewer rate cuts in 2025 than she had anticipated just a few months ago, following strong employment data and lingering inflation.】

item.title: 波兰能源集团 Orlen 在 2035 年计划中提高股息，但今年表现平平
item.description: 波兰最大的能源公司 Orlen SA 计划增加红利，并在未来十年内投资多达 910 亿美元用于清洁能源，以在去年股价暴跌后赢回投资者的信心。【原文：Poland’s largest energy company Orlen SA plans to increase dividends and invest as much as $91 billion in cleaner energy sources over the next decade to win back investors’ confidence after its shares tumbled last year.】

item.title: 以色列官员在欧洲债券发售前在伦敦会见投资者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，本周以色列政府的一批官员将在伦敦与投资者会面，因为以色列的目标是在第一季度发行欧元债券。【原文：A group of Israel government officials is meeting investors in London this week as the country aims to issue eurobonds in the first quarter, according to people familiar with the matter, who asked not to be named because the meetings are private.】

item.title: 芬兰以安全为由禁止供水私有化
item.description: 芬兰提议禁止市政当局以供水安全为由向私人投资者出售供水设施。【原文：Finland proposed to ban municipalities from selling water supply facilities to private investors on grounds of security of supply.】

item.title: 挪威政府称2024年天然气销量将创历史新高
item.description: 挪威的石油和天然气公司在2024年交付了创纪录水平的天然气，并将在明年钻探类似数量的勘探井，以抵消十年后产量的下降。【原文：Norway’s oil and gas companies delivered record levels of natural gas in 2024 and will drill a similar number of exploration wells this coming year, in a push to offset production declines later in the decade.】

item.title: 亲密贸易伙伴中日为何无法和睦相处
item.description: 中国和日本是亚洲最强大的两个国家，也是该地区最大的贸易伙伴。然而，几个世纪以来的激烈竞争意味着它们之间的经济关系绝不是理所当然的。从相互竞争的领土要求到居住在中国的日本国民的待遇，争端可能因各种原因而爆发。【原文：China and Japan are two of Asia’s most powerful nations and the region’s biggest trading partners. Yet centuries of intense rivalry mean their economic embrace can never be taken for granted. Disputes can flare up for all kinds of reasons, from competing territorial claims to the treatment of Japanese nationals living in China.】

item.title: 投资者对英国经济的担忧加剧，零售商业绩下滑
item.description: 由于对英国经济的担忧盖过了英国最大的两家连锁店在假日季的稳健销售，乐购集团和玛莎集团股份有限公司（Marks & Spencer Group Plc）的股价下跌，引发了英国零售股的大范围下挫。【原文：Tesco Plc and Marks & Spencer Group Plc fell, prompting a broader selloff in UK retail shares, as concerns about Britain’s economy outweighed solid holiday season sales by two of the biggest store chains in the country.】

item.title: 据说菲律宾最大的金融科技公司将选择银行进行首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，菲律宾最大的金融科技平台 GCash 已经挑选了几家银行，准备在今年进行首次公开募股。【原文：GCash, the biggest fintech platform in the Philippines, has picked banks to work on an initial public offering that could take place this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 荷兰与英伟达就荷兰人工智能设施举行会谈
item.description: 荷兰政府表示，正在与英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp）和先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.【原文：The Dutch government said it is holding talks with Nvidia Corp and Advanced Micro Devices Inc. regarding support for the construction of an artificial intelligence facility in the Netherlands.】

item.title: 经济疲软导致泰国企业债券销售连续第三年下降
item.description: 泰国债券市场协会（Thai Bond Market Association）称，泰国企业债券销售可能连续第三年下降，因为在经济前景疲软的情况下，该资产类别面临着越来越大的困境。【原文：Thai corporate bond sales may drop for a third straight year as the asset class faces mounting distress amid a weak economic outlook, according to the Thai Bond Market Association.】

item.title: 特朗普回归，台湾对美贸易顺差跃升至创纪录水平
item.description: 2024 年，台湾对美国的贸易顺差飙升至历史新高，这可能会让以消除美国贸易失衡为己任的当选总统唐纳德-特朗普感到不安。【原文：Taiwan’s trade surplus with the US surged to a record high in 2024, a haul that could rankle President-elect Donald Trump as he returns to the White House on a mission to eliminate America’s imbalances in commerce.】

item.title: 英国中型股创下四月以来最低；欧洲股市收复跌幅
item.description: 由于担心财政赤字问题和潜在的通货膨胀率上升，英国的国内指数跌至 4 月份以来的最低点。由于投资者也在关注美国贸易政策的前景，泛欧基准指数抹去了跌幅。【原文：The UK’s domestically-focused index fell to the lowest since April on worries about fiscal deficit concerns and potentially higher inflation. The pan-European benchmark erased declines as investors also monitored the outlook for US trade policy.】

item.title: 匈牙利工业在复苏挑战中连续第九个月萎缩
item.description: 匈牙利 11 月份工业生产降幅超过预期，引发了人们对该国第四季度经济从衰退中复苏的担忧。【原文：Hungarian industrial production declined more than forecast in November, raising concerns about the country’s recovery from a recession in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 据说紫光集团计划在香港上市，筹资约 10 亿美元
item.description: 中国云计算和IT基础设施公司紫光集团（Unisplendour Corp.【原文：Chinese cloud-computing and IT infrastructure company Unisplendour Corp. is preparing for a second listing in Hong Kong as soon as this year that could raise about $1 billion, people familiar with the matter said, as mainland-listed companies make a beeline to sell shares in the city.】

item.title: 伊朗外汇网站关闭，网络攻击在中央银行争执中激增
item.description: 伊朗最受欢迎的里亚尔公开市场汇率追踪网站的管理员说，由于网络攻击和安全问题，他们在受到伊朗中央银行行长的批评后将该网站下线。【原文：Administrators of Iran’s most popular website for tracking the rial’s open-market exchange rate said they took it offline due to cyber attacks and security concerns after criticism from the head of the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 德国工业生产反弹，发出积极增长信号
item.description: 德国 11 月份的工业生产有所增长，为该国陷入困境的制造业在去年年底开始企稳带来了希望。【原文：German industrial production increased in November, offering hope that the country’s struggling manufacturing sector may have begun to stabilize toward the end of last year.】

item.title: 日本央行发出工资问题取得进展的信号，但未明确暗示加息时机
item.description: 日本央行表示，它看到了工资增长方面的进展，但没有就本月是否加息给出明确暗示。【原文：The Bank of Japan indicated it sees progress in wage gains, while refraining from giving any clear hints on whether an interest rate hike is coming this month.】

item.title: 以下是中国管理人民币的工具
item.description: 监督中国人民银行如何处理其外汇市场的 "有管理的浮动汇率 "系统并非易事。央行掌握着各种工具--有些比较透明，比如每日参考汇率，而有些则很模糊，比如中国当局可能暗中敦促银行不要在自营交易中对人民币下注。随着人民币再次接近其允许交易区间的弱势一端— 并接近离岸人民币的历史最低点，作为一种有力的【原文：Monitoring how the People’s Bank of China handles its “managed float” system for the foreign-exchange market isn’t easy. item.title: 英镑跌至 2023 年以来最弱，英国市场普遍下挫
item.description: 由于投资者对英国财政和通胀前景的担忧使英国资产陷入低迷，英镑兑美元汇率跌至一年多来的最弱水平。【原文：The pound tumbled to its weakest level against the US dollar in more than one year as investors’ concerns over the UK fiscal and inflation outlook send the nation’s assets into a tailspin.】

item.title: Janus Henderson 在美国获胜后将 CLO 跟踪基金带到欧洲
item.description: Janus Henderson 在美国巩固了其在一个小众但利润丰厚的投资工具领域的主导地位后，正寻求在欧洲一试身手。【原文：After cementing its position as the dominant player in the US for a niche but highly lucrative investment vehicle, Janus Henderson is looking to try its luck in Europe.】

item.title: 英国生物技术初创企业瞄准减肥行业领军企业诺和诺德和礼来
item.description: 英国一家生物技术初创公司携 4.11 亿美元和前景看好的下一代减肥药进入拥挤的肥胖症药物市场。【原文：A UK biotechnology startup is entering the crowded obesity drug market, armed with $411 million and a promising next-generation weight-loss pill.】
